wikitext.*:
'''Nereb''' (reversal of the name ''Beren'') was the [[Orcs|orc]]-name that [[Beren]] took upon himself when in that disguise during the [[Quest for the Silmaril]].  His companion, [[Finrod|Finrod Felagund]], called himself [[Dungalef]].<ref name="LB">{{LB|C7}}</ref>
